question: How do I add a new product?
answer: To add a new product, navigate to the 'My Products' page and click on the 'Add New Product' button. Fill out the required details and click 'Save'.

question: How can I update my store details?
answer: You can update your store details by going to the 'My Store' page. There you can edit your business name, logo, address, and other information.

question: Where can I see my sales analytics?
answer: Sales analytics are available on the 'Dashboard' page. You can view your revenue, orders, and other key metrics.

question: How do I manage my inventory?
answer: Inventory management can be done from the 'My Products' page. You can update stock levels for each product.

question: What payment methods are supported?
answer: We support a variety of payment methods including credit/debit cards, net banking, and various digital wallets.

question: How do I process an order?
answer: New orders will appear on your 'Orders' page. From there you can view order details, update the order status, and manage shipping.

question: Can I offer discounts on my products?
answer: Yes, you can create and manage discounts from the 'Pricing & Offers' section when adding or editing a product.

question: How do I get paid?
answer: Payouts are automatically transferred to your registered bank account on a weekly basis. You can view your payout history in the 'Account Details' section.

question: What is the return policy?
answer: The return policy is configured by you, the seller. You can set your own return and refund policies for your products.

question: How can I contact support?
answer: For any further assistance, you can contact our support team by sending an email to hadaganpat42@gmail.com.
